name: Appleberry Bay
description:
Welcome to Appleberry Bay! 🍎

Explore this cozy village on the seashore, filled with lots of friends to talk to and things to collect ✨

Controls:
- arrow keys to move
- x to interact
- z to advance dialogue boxes

Made using PICO-8 for LOWREZJAM 2020! 

My first time doing some programming :D Special thanks to pancelor for answering my coding questions and helping me learn.
